everchanging_realm.name: The Everchanging Realm
everchanging_realm.description: A vast and mutable realm where landscapes shift and new wonders (or dangers) constantly emerge.

lore_fragments.ancient_civilizations: Whispers of long-lost civilizations and their forgotten technologies.
lore_fragments.cosmic_anomalies: Occasional strange celestial events that influence the realm.

event_prompts.new_arrival: An unexpected character or entity arrives, bringing change.
event_prompts.environmental_shift: The immediate environment undergoes a sudden or gradual transformation.
event_prompts.resource_scarcity: A vital resource becomes scarce, prompting action or conflict.
event_prompts.mysterious_phenomenon: A strange, unexplained event occurs, inviting investigation.
event_prompts.character_driven_conflict: A conflict arises from existing character relationships or desires.

narrative_segments.segment_002: A brief respite at an oasis, though the horizon already shimmers with an unfamiliar haze.

storage.last_event_prompt: A brief respite at an oasis, though the horizon already shimmers with an unfamiliar haze.

wanderer_elara.name: Elara Meadowlight
wanderer_elara.motivation: To decode the starfall's forgotten warnings hidden in the celestial tomes.

scribe_korbin.name: Korbin Stonehand
scribe_korbin.motivation: To interpret the prophetic warnings of the celestial convergence etched in starlight.

current_scene.location: Subterranean Library of Celestial Records (hidden chamber revealed)
current_scene.description: The trembling ground reveals a subterranean library where shifting tomes pulse with ancient starlight. A vision of the realm's sky fractures reality, showing cataclysmic starfall events etched in celestial script.

storage.celestial_tomes: The shifting tomes pulse with ancient starlight, their pages rewriting themselves in real-time. The vision of the fractured sky merges with reality, causing constellations to flicker across the chamber walls.
